Friday Night Funkin' Easy Engine

VIEW SPIKE182 ALSO ON NEWGROUNDS.COM! https://spike182official.newgrounds.com/

Uh oh! Your tryin to kiss ur hot girlfriend, but her MEAN and EVIL dad is trying to KILL YOU! He's an ex-rockstar, the only way to beat it? The power of music...

WASD/ARROW KEYS IS CONTROLS

- and + are volume control

0 to Mute

It's basically like DDR, press arrow when arrow over other arrow. And uhhh don't die.
